item.title: Rachel add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "Consistency is contrary to nature, contrary to life. The only completely consistent people are the dead." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Two things that matter to me. Emotional resonance and rocket launchers." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Romance novels are birthday cake and life is often peanut butter and jelly. I think everyone should have lots of delicious romance novels lying around for those times when the peanut butter of life gets stuck to the roof of your mouth." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Judy Garland
item.description: "Always be a first rate version of yourself and not a second rate version of someone else." -- Judy Garland

item.title: Rachel add a quote by William Goldman
item.description: "This is my favorite book in all the world, though I have never read it." -- William Goldman

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Stephen Colbert
item.description: "If this is going to be a Christian nation that doesn't help the poor, either we have to pretend that Jesus was just as selfish as we are, or we've got to acknowledge that He commanded us to love the poor and serve the needy without condition and then admit that we just don't want to do it." -- Stephen Colbert

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Joan L. Mitchell
item.description: "Faith is a verb. An action, like love, that we do and live every day." -- Joan L. Mitchell
